alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jackson; Madison; Oglethorpe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clarke, eastern Jackson, northwestern Oglethorpe and Madison Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 212 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Neese, or 7 miles west of Danielsville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Commerce, Danielsville, Nicholson, Comer, Winterville, Colbert, Ila, Carlton, Hull, Athens-Clarke County, Westgate Park, James Holland Youth Sports Cmpx, Pocataligo, Diamond Hill, Smithonia, Sandy Creek Recreation Area, Oconee Heights, Barretts Mill, Paoli and Dunlap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
